history.proof: intros h1 h2 m a H. qsimpl time: 1 use: stream_app_spec1. assert (is_at_least_n_stream (S m) h1). + unfold is_at_least_n_stream. intros n' H1. sfirstorder use: @at_most_n_stream_or_at_least_Sn_stream unfold: is_at_most_n_stream, is_at_least_n_stream. + qsimpl time: 1 use: stream_app_spec1,partial_stream_len_None. assert (partial_stream_len h1 m = None). * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros h1 h2 m a H. apply stream_app_spec1. assert (is_at_least_n_stream (S m) h1). + unfold is_at_least_n_stream. intros n H1. destruct H1. + apply partial_stream_len_None. auto. assert (partial_stream_len h1 m = None). + apply partial_stream_len_None. apply H0. simpl. rewrite H. auto.
